price: (11) So he came out to his people from the prayer chamber and signaled to them to exalt [Allāh] in the morning and afternoon.
arabic: فَخَرَجَ عَلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦ مِنَ ٱلۡمِحۡرَابِ فَأَوۡحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡهِمۡ أَن سَبِّحُواْ بُكۡرَةٗ وَعَشِيّٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fakharaja ʿalā qawmihi mina al-miḥ'rābi fa-awḥā ilayhim an sabbiḥū buk'ratan waʿashiyyan
